addOwner(address).details: Allows to add a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

changeRequirement(uint256).details: Allows to change the number of required confirmations. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

confirmTransaction(uint256).details: Allows an owner to confirm a transaction.

constructor.details: Contract constructor sets initial owners and required number of confirmations.

executeTransaction(uint256).details: Allows anyone to execute a confirmed transaction.

getConfirmationCount(uint256).details: Returns number of confirmations of a transaction.

getConfirmations(uint256).details: Returns array with owner addresses, which confirmed transaction.

getTransactionCount(bool,bool).details: Returns total number of transactions after filers are applied.

returns.count: Total number of transactions after filters are applied.

getTransactionIds(uint256,uint256,bool,b.details: Returns list of transaction IDs in defined range.

params.from: Index start position of transaction array.
params.to: Index end position of transaction array.

isConfirmed(uint256).details: Returns the confirmation status of a transaction.

removeOwner(address).details: Allows to remove an owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

replaceOwner(address,address).details: Allows to replace an owner with a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

revokeConfirmation(uint256).details: Allows an owner to revoke a confirmation for a transaction.

submitTransaction(address,uint256,bytes,.details: Allows an owner to submit and confirm a transaction.

params.description: A brief description of this transaction, less than 32 bytes.
